domain.name: jobsone.com.au
domain.description: JobsOne - Apply to your perfect job in 60 seconds. AI-powered job matching that connects you to real opportunities instantly, no endless scrolling.

seo.title: JobsOne - One-Minute Job Match | AI-Powered Job Search Australia
seo.description: Apply to your perfect job in 60 seconds with AI-powered matching. Skip endless scrolling - get instant matches for software development, remote work and more.

content.title: Find Your Perfect Job in 60 Seconds
content.subtitle: AI-powered job matching analyzes your skills and experience to connect you with ideal opportunities instantly. No more endless scrolling through irrelevant listings.

features.title: 60-Second Applications
features.description: Upload your CV once, apply to multiple perfect matches in seconds. SEEK and Indeed take 5-10 minutes per application.

features.title: AI-Powered Matching
features.description: Our AI analyzes your actual skills and experience, not just keywords. Get better matches than traditional job boards.

features.title: Verified Opportunities
features.description: All jobs are pre-screened for legitimacy. No fake listings, MLM schemes, or commission-only 'opportunities'.

emailCapture.headline: Get Instant Job Matches
emailCapture.description: Join 5,000+ professionals getting AI-powered job recommendations. Skip the job board maze and get matched to perfect opportunities.
emailCapture.successMessage: Perfect! Upload your CV and we'll send you personalized job matches within minutes.
